name: Endpoint for returning Marketplace data can include parameters to specify a specific Plugin ID  and return all versions
objective: Verify that plugin update is confirmed by the user

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
1. Setup or locate a market place server
2. Send a curl script that returns all the marketplace data such as:
curl https://api.integrations.mattermost.com/api/v1/plugins?build_enterprise_ready=true&cloud=true&enterprise_plugins=true&filter=&local_only=false&page=0&platform=linux-amd64&server_version=5.30.0
inline.testData: • Replace https://api.integrations.mattermost.com with your own marketplace server if testing somewhere other than production
inline.expectedResult: All Marketplace data for your platform is returned

inline.description:
1. Setup or locate a market place server
2. Send a curl script that returns all the marketplace data for the current version of a given plugin such as: curl https://api.integrations.mattermost.com/api/v1/plugins?build_enterprise_ready=true&cloud=true&enterprise_plugins=true&filter=&local_only=false&page=0&platform=linux-amd64&plugin_id=com.mattermost.plugin-incident-management&server_version=5.30.0
inline.testData: • Replace https://api.integrations.mattermost.com with your own marketplace server if testing somewhere other than production
inline.expectedResult: Marketplace data for the current version of incident response is shown.

inline.description:
1. Setup or locate a market place server
2. Send a curl script that returns marketplace data for all version of a given plugin such as:
curl https://api.integrations.mattermost.com/api/v1/plugins?build_enterprise_ready=true&cloud=true&enterprise_plugins=true&filter=&local_only=false&page=0&platform=linux-amd64&plugin_id=com.mattermost.plugin-incident-management&return_all_versions=true&server_version=5.30.0
inline.testData: • Replace https://api.integrations.mattermost.com with your own marketplace server if testing somewhere other than production
inline.expectedResult: Marketplace data for all version of incident response is shown.
